title: Imam - Community Mosque
description: We are seeking a dedicated Imam to lead our growing community in daily prayers, Friday sermons, and religious guidance. The ideal candidate should have strong knowledge of Islamic jurisprudence and excellent communication skills.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Islamic Studies or equivalent

title: Online Quran Tutor
description: Join our team of dedicated online Quran tutors to teach students of all ages. Flexible schedule with competitive compensation.

title: Islamic School Teacher
description: Teaching position for Islamic Studies and Arabic language for elementary students. We offer a supportive environment and professional development opportunities.

title: Mosque Helper/Maintenance
description: Part-time position to assist with mosque maintenance, event setup, and general facility management. Perfect for someone looking to serve the community.
requirements: Physical ability to lift and move equipment

title: Arabic Language Tutor
description: Experienced Arabic tutor needed for individual and group lessons. Both in-person and online options available.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Arabic or related field

title: Youth Program Coordinator
description: Coordinate and manage youth programs, events, and activities for our Islamic community center. Great opportunity for someone passionate about youth development.
